item.title: Bio
item.description: Brian Gruber is a software engineer who likes computers, music, and combinations thereof. He currently serves as the Principal Architect on the engineering team for Meetup, where he’s been helping people use the internet to get off the internet since 2011. He particularly enjoys making musical noises out of data: sometimes with a practical purpose in mind; sometimes to make art; and sometimes just to see what it will sound like.
